name: TripTalk
0:
”Alexa, open TripTalk”
”Learn me Dutch”
”Go to chapter one”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: trip talk
des: With TripTalk, you will learn 100 easy sentences to find your way abroad, in various situations. Right now we can teach you Dutch, Spanish and Swedish.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
